thread.title: 20 km high space elevator tower planned
thread.title_full: 20 km high space elevator tower planned

title: 20 km high space elevator tower planned
text:
20 km high space elevator tower planned Thursday, 3 September 2015 12:47 PM A revolutionary plan to build a 20 kilometre high inflatable structure to propel spacecraft into the atmosphere has been announced by Canadian company Thoth Technology. 
(Reuters YouTube channel) German scientists hope to see their home-made, low-cost, robot examining the moon in the near future while they work on ways to lower risks of malfunctioning.
